item.description:
This is a sister game to Sergeants! on the Eastern Front game by LBG. It is playable by itself or can be added to the game system (1st edition games only).

North Africa in World War Two saw sweeping campaigns across the desert sands. This game recreates incidents in the sparse landscape of the desert as small skirmishes raged between British and Italian forces commanded by sergeants and other noncommissioned officers. YOU command one side. Can YOU defeat the enemy in this easy to learn and exciting historical war game? This introduction-level game simulates World War II infantry actions at the man-to man level. The game, without going into overwhelming detail, test the tactical skills of the players, each commanding small opposing forces. Combat at this level focuses on the immediate enemy, his locations and weapons, the terrain and sheer survival. Sergeants!™ is an infinitely expandable game that is fast, fun and surprisingly inexpensive.


 Mapboard - This shows the terrain of the game's playing area 
 140 Die-Cut Playing Pieces - These units represent soldiers, their weapons and information markers 
 Dice - Two six-sided dice are included 
 Rules Folder - This contains the rules of play 
 Scenario - contains the game's scenario "Waterhole" 
 Charts - contains the charts needed to play the game 
 Our Baby Monster Game - Features a downloadable free scenario for SERGEANTS!™ every month
